inputs.name: major_axis
inputs.description: The length of the ellipse's major (longer) axis.

inputs.name: minor_axis
inputs.description: The length of the ellipse's minor (shorter) axis.

inputs.name: num_points
inputs.description: The number of points to generate along the ellipse's circumference.

inputs.name: grid_size
inputs.description: Optional (width, height) of the grid to center the pattern in.

output.description: A list of points, where each point is a tuple of (x, y, heading).
